recibir_info: I agree to receive information and promotions electronically.
cargo: This request will generate extra charges
no_compartir: We will not share your ID with any other user.
instruccion_scanner: The Passport will then be scanned.Make sure there is a clear and visible image.
foto_titulo_uno:
Take the first photo:
front of the identification document
foto_body_uno: Make sure there is good lighting and adjust the front of the ID until it fits inside the white border. Tap Continue when you have everything ready.
foto_titulo_dos:
Take the second photo:
back of the identification document
foto_body_dos: Make sure there is good lighting and adjust the back of the ID until it fits inside the white border. Tap the camera icon when you have everything ready.
max_adultos: You have reached the maximum of adult companions.
max_menores: You have reached the maximum number of minor companions.
max_acompanantes: You have reached the maximum number of companions.
invalid_storage_code: Your storage codes are invalid. Please capture a new code
room_capacity: Your room have a capacity for:
name_age_invalid: the name and the first date are required params
not_more_adults: This room not have capacity for more adults
not_more_minors: This room not have capacity for more minors
add_adult_alert: This action needs 2 spaces of minors.
add_minor_alert: This action needs 1 spaces of adults.
invalid_date_adult_alert: The selected date must be equal to or greater than 18 years
invalid_date_minor_alert: The selected date must be under to 18 years
covid_cuestionary_subtitle: Dear guest, due to the situation caused by the current health emergency, please complete the following questionnaire:
reglameto_covid: I agree to follow the Sunset World Safe Stay ™️  program, created in compliance with the new COVID-19 protocols.
email_tel: E-mail and phone number with area code:
pais_visitado: What countries or cities have you visited the last 15 days?
enContacto: Do you know if you have been in contact with a confirmed COVID-19 case?
control_salud: Please fill the following health questions
control_salud_instruccion: Do you have any of the following symptoms?
malestar: General discomfort, headache or any other acute health problem?
adult_required: You must be of legal age
cuestionary_required: It is necessary to answer the health survey
all_cuestionary_required: It is necessary to answer all the health surveys
values_invalid: Some fields are required or invalid
no_passport: No passport found. Capture the requested document.
